responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "918D3AB14B8F72BE5EE1F7AA03B4C11A", "As an artifact of imprisonment, or should I say,\"in-prism-ment?\" The evil of Ozu is held within to help focus its arcane energy. If one can find wrest the crystal from the mad mage, the spell will be interrupted and the power of the crystal released to be sentenced to oblivion. ")
name: MADD_0005A_BLO_Antiquitor_15
